name: Swotch
description:
Swotch is a psychedelic arcade game about gravity switching. You control a block that needs to avoid the coming obstacles, using the arrow keys.

Collect the power ups (big squares) to fill your Slow-mo bar.

Left / Right or A / D : Move
Spacebar : Slow motion !

You can also use an Xbox 360 controller.

(An Android/iOS port will probably be released if the game is appreciated enough. Support it on Ludum Dare )

Music by http://playonloop.com/
